item.title: I interact w some of you here almost everyday IRL at work and it feels quite strange ngl

item.title:
we listen and we don‚Äôt judge
up until today I had no idea what my notice/non compete is, or the difference between the two. I did read the contract a few times before but I still didn‚Äôt understand and I was too scared to ask.
but today I found out what they are

item.title:
RT by @quantymacro: looked through some student CVs for quant roles. IMO a quick (& extreme) heuristic is that if your experiences can also be written in someone else‚Äôs CV, they‚Äôre too vague/not specific enough
‚Äúutilised ML techniques to develop quant strategy‚Äù isn‚Äôt rly saying anything. gl allüôè
item.dc:creator: @quantymacro
item.description:
looked through some student CVs for quant roles. IMO a quick (& extreme) heuristic is that if your experiences can also be written in someone else‚Äôs CV, they‚Äôre too vague/not specific enough

‚Äúutilised ML techniques to develop quant strategy‚Äù isn‚Äôt rly saying anything.

item.title: is making partner at Citadel and managing your own book at 35 considered good? I‚Äôve always thought if you don‚Äôt become the head of quant research by 20 you‚Äôre ngmi. but this is something I‚Äôd know nothing about since I‚Äôve never ran my own book

item.title: actually no I take it back. here I wasn‚Äôt doing much modelling ‚Äî I was doing more ad-hoc stuffs for the team. now I spend 90% of my time fitting shitty models models at work I have 0 interest in fitting shitty models at home lmao I just wanna go back home and watch Netflix

item.title: today I found out that I can improve one of my signals by 20% by just cranking up the ridge regularisation to a *much* higher value. happy about it but also embarrassed that I only found out now. will do better sorry
item.dc:creator: @quantymacro
item.description: today I found out that I can improve one of my signals by 20% by just cranking up the ridge regularisation to a *much* higher value. happy about it but also embarrassed that I only found out now. will do better sorry

item.title:
you‚Äôve been invited to a free dinner. do you prefer to hear that it‚Äôs a 1) buffet, or 2) fine dining? assume both are of the same quality

AMA.
